Key Match Events: West Indies bounced back with a comprehensive nine-wicket win over co-hosts USA on 21 June.
Roston Chase secured a Player of the Match award for his 3/19.
West Indies completed a chase of 129 by the 11th over.
Pre-Game Insights: A win in their next fixture against South Africa places the West Indies in a good position to make it to the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024 semi-finals.
West Indies all-rounder Roston Chase looked at his team’s Powerplay game as a crucial determinant in their ability to control the contest.
West Indies went up against South Africa in May and recorded a 3-0 series win.
Chase emphasized the importance of focusing on the present and upcoming future, rather than past results.
Post-Match Reflections: Chase believed that once West Indies had a good start, they had enough firepower to make the most of this momentum in the death overs.
Chase remarked on the importance of controlling the Powerplay with both batting and bowling.
Chase noted that despite South Africa’s undefeated run, West Indies were determined to contest strongly.
